Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Provides for the review of unfunded mandates
Summary: Provides for the review of unfunded mandates; provides that the comptroller shall provide a fiscal note for unfunded mandates affecting political subdivisions; directs a continuing study.
LawCode: Amd ยง51, Leg L; add ยง50-a, Exec L; add ยง208, St Ad Proc Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the legislative law, the executive law and the state administrative procedure act, in relation to unfunded mandate review
